```lisp
[
  (:action move
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?from - location ?to - location)
   :precondition (and 
                   (at ?agent ?from)
                   (connected ?from ?to))
   :effect (and 
             (not (at ?agent ?from))
             (at ?agent ?to))),

  (:action put
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?object - item ?destination - location)
   :precondition (and 
                   (at ?agent ?destination)
                   (holding ?agent ?object)
                   (not (in ?object ?destination))
                   (clear ?destination))
   :effect (and 
            (in ?object ?destination)
            (not (holding ?agent ?object)))),

  (:action pick
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item ?location - location)
   :precondition (and
                   (at ?agent ?location)
                   (or (in ?item ?location) (on ?item ?location))
                   (not (holding ?agent ?item)))
   :effect (and
             (holding ?agent ?item)
             (not (in ?item ?location))
             (not (on ?item ?location)))),

  (:action prevent
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?object - item ?location - location)
   :precondition (and
                   (holding ?agent ?object)
                   (is_location ?location))
   :effect (and
             (not (at ?object ?location))
             (not (in ?object ?location)))),

  (:action avoid
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item ?restricted_location - location)
   :precondition (and
                   (holding ?agent ?item)
                   (at ?agent ?restricted_location))
   :effect (and
             (not (in ?item ?restricted_location)))),

  (:action pickup
   :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item ?container - container)
   :precondition (and
                   (at ?agent ?container)
                   (in ?item ?container)
                   (free_hand ?agent))
   :effect (and
             (holding ?agent ?item)
             (not (in ?item ?container))))
]
```
